The Selah Duo

About Us

Alex

A versatile multi-instrumentalist, Alex regularly performs with a range of ensembles in a variety of styles, from pop to ska. His first love, however, remains the guitar, which began his musical journey. Alex enjoys exploring the colours and textures of jazz in his playing, combining the walking bass lines and exotic rhythms. He brings lush tones, smooth feel and natural touch into every song and request he plays.

Joanna

Having been classically trained since 7 years old, Joanna brings wealth of experience to her violin playing. From years of performing with orchestras to smaller ensembles and church bands, she has honed her technical and improvisation skills. Through The Selah Duo she enjoys bringing the traditional jazz songs to the audience, being inspired by the likes of Stephane Grappelli, Ella Fitzgerald and Sarah Vaughan.
